|brand = Digital Loggers |model = Atomic Pi |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (MFC1) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 4 August 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Atomic_Pi |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1907MF0104 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;Z8350;x5-Z8350; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.44-1.92 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC16G-M525; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q64FWSIG; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16DP-DI; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111G; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, HDMI, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN10 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, Audio out, Bluetooth 4.0, accelerometer, gyroscope, I2C, UART, GPIO, heatsink |addchip = Power Management IC;TI;SND9039A2;;1;,,, USB to Audio CoProcessor;XMOS;XUF208-128;;1;,,, 10W Digital Audio Power Amplifier;TI;TAS5717;;1;,,, 4-Port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Hub Controller;Microchip;USB4604;;1;,,, Bluetooth 4.0 Single-chip Radio and Baseband IC;Qualcomm;CSR8510;;1;,,, USB 2.0 to SD 3.0/MMC Memory Card Reader Controller;Genesys Logic;GL835;;1;,,, Dual Bidirectional I2C-bus and SMBus Voltage-Level Translator;TI;PCA9306DCUR;;1;,,, Advanced Load Management Controlled Switch;OnSemi;NCP45520;;1;,,, Adjustable Low Dropout 300mA Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5325;;2;,,, Dual Double-pole Double-Throw Analog Switch;NXP;NX3DV3899;;1;,,, Low-voltage N-MOSFET High-Side Power Switch;Richtek;RT9742;;1;,,, Intelligent 9-axis Absolute Orientation Sensor;Bosch;BNO055;;1;,,, ESD Protection Array for I/O Port;Amazing Micro;AZ1045-04F;;9;,,, 2A Ultra Low Dropout LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9025;;2;,,, Sink/Source DDR Termination Regulator;TI;TPS51200;;1;,,, 10A, 18V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8762;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = atomicpi |defaultpass = atomicpi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = AAEON |manuf_model = MF001 |manuf_rev = A1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, OpenWrt (Was), Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2018 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07N298F2B |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT5572;RT5572N; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 @1.44GHz (Turbo @1.92GHz) :GPU: [[Intel]] HD Graphics 400 (4K UHD, Full HD) *Storage: 8MB (SPI) Flash, 16GB eMMC, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Memory: 2GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *WLAN: 2T2R 802.11abgn, Bluetooth 4.0 *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 2.0 header *GPIO: 1x 26-pin header *Power Source: 5V via 26-pin header
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/intel-cherry-trail-based-hacker-board-launches-for-34/ ''Intel Cherry Trail based hacker board launches'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/04/26/buy-atomic-pi-cherry-trail-sbc/ ''$35 Atomic Pi Cherry Trail Linux SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Atomic Pi Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Atomic Pi Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
